MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH1 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:12pm. Our engineer has now arrived at the Grassmarket substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:53pm on Monday, 26 October 2020
